comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Funeral of "Big" Tim Sullivan, at old St. Patrick's, Mott Street, New York, on September 15, 1913.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan,

Thanks for the info on this image and the others of the funeral of 'Big Tim' Sullivan.  We will update this record as well as the other related images to reflect the details.
